title: My game keeps crashing!
body: whenever I get in to a game a couple seconds in the game will crash. It doesn't bugsplat or give me a connection error either. I was also have issues with lag in one of my custom matches I played. This only started happening after the recent patch

replies.body:
Interesting! I've seen this a few times, and I suspect that it could be the result of some recent Windows features that recently were updated or rolled out. To see if they're causing the issue, I recommend disabling them. The first is the Xbox Game Bar, which can be disabled with the steps [here.](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) The second is the SmartScreen filter, which ships with Windows 10, which [this guide](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/930168) will help you disable it. Additionally, if you run League in any sort of [compatibility mode](http://www.windows10forums.com/articles/compatibility-mode.7/), it could be causing this as well.

Let me know if those helped.
